servinfo.title: Mass Air Flow (MAF) and Intake Air Temperature (IAT) Sensor Inspection

attention2.ptxt: Do not heat up MAF and IAT sensor more than 100 °C (212 °F). Otherwise, MAF and IAT sensor will be damaged.

item.ptxt: Check sensor O-ring (1) for damage and deterioration. Replace as necessary.
Blow hot air to temperature sensing part (2) of MAF and IAT sensor (3) using hot air drier (4) and measure resistance between sensor terminals while heating air gradually.
If measured resistance does not show such characteristic as shown, replace MAF and IAT sensor.
